title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte! This eyeshadow stick is perfect for our beloved seniors who want an easy and hassle-free makeup routine.

Featuring a highly pigmented formula, this eyeshadow stick delivers intense, long-lasting color in a beautiful light taupe-pink shade. The matte finish adds a touch of elegance to any look. Plus, with a variety of shade options including matte, shimmer, and metallic, you can create endless eye-catching looks.

This eyeshadow stick is not only stunning but also packed with beneficial ingredients. Infused with Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax, it nourishes and protects delicate and sensitive skin. The waterproof and crease-proof formula ensures that your eyeshadow stays in place all day long, even through rain or tears.

Applying this eyeshadow stick is a breeze, as no application tool is required. It comes with a built-in smudger, making it easy to blend and create a seamless look. Just coat the smudger with color, sweep the stick directly onto your eyelids, and use the smudger or your fingers to blend. Make sure to blend before the formula sets for a flawless finish.

With the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, achieving beautiful eye looks has never been easier. Say goodbye to the confusion and frustration of complicated makeup products. Upgrade your makeup routine today and embrace the simplicity and elegance of Julep Eyeshadow 101!

Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte! 

This highly pigmented eyeshadow stick is perfect for achieving a beautiful matte finish. The light taupe-pink color is flattering and versatile. You can choose from a range of shades including matte, shimmer, and metallic finishes. 

The crème-to-powder formula ensures smooth and effortless application. Plus, it's waterproof and crease-proof, so your eyeshadow will stay put all day long. 

But that's not all! This eyeshadow stick is enriched with Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax to nourish and protect delicate sensitive skin. It also offers antioxidant protection and improves skin tone and texture. 

You don't need any additional tools to apply this eyeshadow - it's brush-free! It even comes with a built-in smudger for easy blending. Just coat the smudger with color, sweep the stick directly onto your eyelids, and use the smudger or your fingers to blend. Remember to blend before the formula sets for a flawless look. 

Don't miss out on this amazing eyeshadow stick that's specifically designed to be user-friendly for all ages, including our beloved elderly folks. Try the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte today and experience the difference!
